lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte was accused of fabricating his account of the episode, in which he said armed men had held up him and three teammates. A police chief said they had vandalized a gas station.

byline.contributor: Vinod Sreeharsha, Mariana Simões and Paula Moura contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Accused of Fabricating Robbery, Swimmers Fuel Tension in Brazil
headline.main: U.S. Swimmers’ Disputed Robbery Claim Fuels Tension in Brazil

snippet: Ryan Lochte was accused of fabricating his account of the episode, in which he said armed men had held up him and three teammates. A police chief said they had vandalized a gas station....
abstract: Unraveling of American Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte's version of encounter between group of athletes and Brazilian authorities, which he originally described as armed robbery, strains relations between two countries; incident reflects ongoing concerns in country where privileged are seen as shielded from violent crime that plagues ordinary citizens.
